c74object.name: spat5.multi.connect
c74object.description:
To use spat5.multi.connect, select objects to connect and hit the [ ! ] button to connect all outlets to all inlets.
Additional features include: [ \ ] to connect one outlet to multiple inlets, [ / ] to connect multiple outlets to one inlet, and [ | ] to match all selected objects to the top obect's x position and width values.
To make connections, spat5.multi.connect first needs to know how many inlets/outlets to try as an argument or as an int message. note: there will be ignorable error messages if your number of connections setting is larger than the number of inlets or outlets of the selected objects.
spat5.multi.connect has been developed by Rama Gottfried (2012); based on the maxtoolbox by Nathanaël Lécaudé.
